parameters.name: Duration
parameters.description: The service duration. This parameter is used together with the PricingCycle parameter.

parameters.name: EffectiveDate
parameters.description: The time when the savings plan takes effect. Specify the time in the ISO 8601 standard in the yyyy-MM-ddTHH:mm:ssZ format. The time must be in UTC.

parameters.name: PayMode
parameters.description:
The payment mode. Valid values:

*   total: all upfront
*   half: partial upfront
*   zero: no upfront

parameters.name: PricingCycle
parameters.description:
The unit of the service duration. This parameter is used together with the During parameter. Valid values:

*   Year
*   Month

parameters.name: Region
parameters.description: The ID of the region in which you create the savings plan. You must specify this parameter if the Type parameter is not set to universal.

parameters.name: SpecType
parameters.description:
The specification type. This parameter is used together with the Specification parameter. You must specify this parameter if the Type parameter is not set to universal. Valid values:

*   group: specification group
*   family: specification family

parameters.name: Specification
parameters.description: The specifications of the savings plan. This parameter is used together with the SpecType parameter.

parameters.name: Type
parameters.description:
The type of the savings plan. Valid values:

*   universal: general-purpose type
*   ecs: ECS compute type
*   elasticy: elastic type
